author: Special Correspondent
text:
P.T. Rudra Goud, Puducherry Civil Service (Junior Administrative Grade) has been posted as Joint Chief Electoral Officer in Puducherry in place of Ravideep Singh Chahar, who has been posted as Director, State Executive Committee, Department of Revenue and Disaster Management.

A G.O. said the transfer and posting with immediate effect has been done with the concurrence of the Election Commission of India.
title: P. T. Rudra Goud posted as Joint CEO
